name: Alexander M. Vinokurov

bbs.title: OOO «BBS»
details: development of the portal for processing billing data ("Universal Payment Bills", receipts and other payment documents);
creation of web-interface and web-components for generating reports, managing orders' statuses and routes, sending email notifications to clients;
web interface and the server part of module for processing PDF files according to a given template, module for generating attendant documentation have been developed;
application build process has been optimized, build time was reduced by more than 20 times and the build size by 2.5 times;
implemented interfaces for downloading and editing address data provided by clients, interface of updating the post office database;
services for automated label output and technical designations output, combining documents for sending and further printing have been created;
web-interface of the transport-logistics module has been designed;
additional mode and the interface for fast scanning and searching for scanned barcodes has been developed;
integration of the portal with the system for printing lottery tickets and scratch cards.

iif.title: MOU «IIF»
details: application with web interface has been developed for maintaining warehouse records, managing and editing a buying plan;
additional section of the corporate website was implemented for interaction with clients for security system purchasing and receiving technical support;
design of the system for gathering and processing information to rate the functioning of the complex of technical means for perimeter protection;
development of desktop- and web-interfaces for managing the security complex and its interaction with peripheral devices;
the client-server simulation model of the communication system as part of scientific project has been developed;
architectural supervision of the production cycle, coordination of work between departments.

mai: Moscow Aviation Institute (National Research University), applied mathematics and computer science speciality (diploma with distinction), 2008 - 2014.
